title: NIMHANS Notification 2026 - Walk-in interview for 02 Project Scientist B Posts
description: The National Institute of Mental Health and Neurosciences (NIMHANS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Project Scientist B, Clinical Scientist Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.Sc, MD/MS can apply for the NIMHANS Notification 2026. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education ...
